resource: 1002191.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1002191.description=Contact with the Safety Connect<sup>®</sup> response center is dependent upon cellular connection availability and GPS satellite signal reception, which can limit the ability to reach the response center or receive emergency service support. Enrollment and Subscription Service Agreement required. One-year trial subscription available only with new vehicle purchase of Safety Connect<sup>®</sup>-equipped vehicles. Additional subscription terms available; charges vary by subscription term selected. 1002191.vtc=true 1002191.derived=false
